name: Company of Heroes 2: Case Blue Mission Pack
name_original: Company of Heroes 2: Case Blue Mission Pack
description:
Company of Heroes 2: Case Blue Mission Pack is a strategy game developed by Relic Entertainment. It was originally released in 2013. It was published by SEGA. The game is rated as "Meh" on RAWG.
You can play Company of Heroes 2: Case Blue Mission Pack on PC.
